org.thegalactic.dgraph

Interface DGraph<N,E>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - Node content type
    E - Edge content type
    To Do#1

    Do use N insteand of Node and E instead of Edge by defining DGraph<N extends Comparable, E>

    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDGraph, ArrowRelation, ConceptLattice, ConcreteDGraph, DAGraph, Lattice

    public interface DGraph<N,E>

    DGraph.
